course_description: The Professional Leadership and Development course expands on the leadership theme taught throughout the curriculum. Through this course, students become better prepared for transition from student to professional as they embark on their physical therapy careers. Students will learn about leadership, identifying individual styles along with personal strengths and weaknesses. Students will learn skills for professional development and establish plans for professional growth.
